projects.name: Nihon Nomad Travel Agency
projects.description: The aim was to create a landing page for a product of our choice. I chose to create a fake Japan travel Agency. For this project, I used only my own photos, and I wanted to integrate a slider and parallax effects.

projects.name: Pokédex
projects.description: The aim was to create the most accurate pokédex possible. All pokémons are available up to #898.

projects.name: Awalé Game
projects.description: The aim is to recreate an Awalé game. For the moment, the game is accessible to 2 human players, but I'd like to integrate a player-versus-computer mode with several levels of difficulty.

projects.name: Compose ta salade!
projects.description: Compose ta salade ! is a side-project designed to train in programming. The first version is in native JavaScript, but I want to completely rebuild it using React.
